org.ow2.chameleon.rose
Class AbstractImporterComponent

java.lang.Object
  org.ow2.chameleon.rose.AbstractImporterComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImporterService
public abstract class AbstractImporterComponent
extends Object
implements ImporterService

Abstract implementation of an proxy-creator which provides an ImporterService. Start must be call before registering the service ! Stop must be called while the service is no more available !

Version:
0.2.0
Author:
barjo

destroyProxy

protected abstract void destroyProxy(org.osgi.service.remoteserviceadmin.EndpointDescription description,
                                     org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistration registration)
Abstract method, is called when the sub class must destoy the proxy. Do not forget to unregister the proxy, call: registration.unregister()

stop

protected void stop()
Stop the proxy-creator, iPOJO Invalidate instance callback. Must be override ! Close all endpoints.

start

protected void start()
Start the endpoint-creator component, iPOJO Validate instance callback. Must be override !

isValid

protected final boolean isValid()
Returns:
true if the ImporterService is in a valid state, false otherwise.
